body:
To speed up the build of large stacks, it would be nice of the DAG of package dependencies could be build in parallel. A late-failure option would be useful for automated testing. Late-failure means, that if e.g. A depends on B and C, and the build of B fails, C is still being tried to build. 

This ticket is an outcome of the discussion on:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/spack/RF_jbW8qY9I
title: Allow parallel build of packages
